job.title: Site Reliability Engineer - 100% Remote
job.description: ltpgtOur client is looking for a Site Reliability Engineer to help build and support the ultimate voicebased conversational AIltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtTitle ltstronggt Site Reliability EngineerltpgtltpgtltstronggtLocation ltstronggt 100  RemoteltpgtltpgtltstronggtDuration ltstronggt FulltimeltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtResponsibilities ltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtBe part of oncall rotation to respond to urgent bugs or production outagesltligtltligtProactively identify and fix infrastructure bottlenecksltligtltligtChoosing tooling for and understanding of CI  CDltligtltligtGCP knowledgeltligtltligtKubernetes In a production environmentltligtltligtDockerltligtltligtKnowledge of working in an Agile environmentltligtltligtInfrastructure As CodeltligtltligtDevelop integrate and support features in the core server stackltligtltligtDevelop and support data pipeline and infrastructureltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtDesirable Skills IncludeltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtMicroservices ArchitectureltligtltligtGoltligtltligtPythonltligtltligtML OpsltligtltligtShould be able to apply different tenants configuration through code as well as toolsltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtExperience ltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtltstronggt35 years of experience in working with infrastructure as codeltstronggtltligtltligtltstronggtAt least 1 year in Python or GolanltstronggtgltligtltligtComfortable developing maintaining DevOps pipelinesltligtltligtStrong experience working with cloud services  AWS or GCP preferredltligtltligtExposure to NLPAIML is a huge plusltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtIf interested please email me your resume at rahulavestacscomltstronggtltpgt
